name: Space Yurt
description:
We invite you to explore the upper Andromeda galaxy in your luxurious and private space yurt! The Messier Space Yurt is a modern adaptation of the cherished shelters used by Central Asian nomads on Earth from time immemorial. In addition to the finest celestial comforts, you can't beat the views from your private observatory! 

This is not your run of the orbit galactic glamping escape! Each space yurt offers spectacular views of 18 sunrises and sunsets per day. And, you'll get front row scopage of the once in a lifetime Frant Shmerty Super Nova Event! Your custom voyage includes all modern amenities for the discerning vacationaut. Get on the manifest and secure your stellar excursion today!
